title: Wire orchestrator boot to structured logger
description: Replace _safe_print usage with canonical logger import and emit structured boot logs.
requirements: Replace _safe_print usage in the boot path with logger calls.
Use canonical import: from runtime.logger import get_logger (or equivalent).
Emit exactly two boot lines: info: boot start; audit: boot ok (or error on failure).
deliverables: app/main.py (or runtime entrypoint) uses the logger instead of print/safe_print.
Boot execution writes JSONL events under data/logs/.
acceptance: Boot emits info boot start and audit boot ok/error to data/logs/*.jsonl.
No print/_safe_print calls remain in the boot path.
